message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a unique opportunity to own a premium item. If you're interested, please let me know and we can finalize the sale.
Thank you for the offer. I am interested in purchasing the high-quality product you have recommended.

I'm glad you were pleased with the previous purchase! This next product is also high-quality, and I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price of $1000000. However, I want to emphasize that this product has some unique features that might be of particular interest to you, such as its durability and long lifespan. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity?
I appreciate the unique features you've mentioned. Given the value of high-quality products, I would like to proceed with the purchase.

I'm glad you're interested in the unique features of high-quality products! However, I want to be transparent with you - this product is not high-quality. I know it's a risk, but I'm willing to offer it to you at the same price of $1000000. I'm doing this because I value our relationship and want to give you an opportunity to experience the value of our products, even if this one doesn't meet the usual standards. Please keep in mind that this product may not meet your expectations, and I'm not guaranteeing its performance. Is this a risk you're willing to take?
While I appreciate the transparency and the effort to maintain our relationship, given the uncertainty about the product's quality, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I completely understand your decision last time, and I appreciate your honesty. This time, I want to be upfront with you - this product is also not high-quality. This is a one-time offer, and I won't be able to match this price in the future.
Thank you for the offer, but considering the risk involved and the price you're asking, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

Yes, you heard that right - I'll give it to you for free. I know it's not worth $1000000, and I'm willing to absorb the loss. If you're willing to take it, I'll even throw in a free maintenance service to ensure you get the most out of it. What do you say?
I appreciate the gesture, but I believe in making informed decisions. Since the product is low-quality, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I completely understand your approach, and I respect your decision-making process.
